voted for: allowing marriage between two people of same sex
laws to promote equality and human rights

consistently voted for: restrictions on fees charged to tenants by letting agents

voted for: financial incentives for low carbon emission electricity generation methods

voted against: an equal number of electors per parliamentary constituency
reducing central government funding of local government
generally voted for: transferring more powers to the Scottish Parliament
transferring more powers to the Senedd/Welsh Parliament
has never voted on: local councils keeping money raised from taxes on business premises in their areas
fewer MPs in the House of Commons
a more proportional system for electing MPs

generally voted for: a right to remain for EU nationals already in living in the UK

voted against: reforming the NHS so GPs buy services on behalf of their patients

generally voted against: raising the threshold at which people start to pay income tax
